/* selectBoardList */
SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.BOARD_PW , CASE WHEN A.BOARD_OPEN_YN IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE A.BOARD_OPEN_YN END AS BOARD_OPEN_YN , A.HITS , A.USE_YN , A.REG_ID , B.NAME AS REG_NAME , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE , A.UPDT_ID , TO_CHAR(A.UPDT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON B.MBER_ID = A.REG_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC

/* selectBoardListCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON B.MBER_ID = A.REG_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* selectBoardDetail */
SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.BOARD_PW , CASE WHEN A.BOARD_OPEN_YN IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE A.BOARD_OPEN_YN END AS BOARD_OPEN_YN , A.HITS , A.USE_YN , A.REG_ID , B.NAME AS REG_NAME , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE , A.UPDT_ID , TO_CHAR(A.UPDT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON B.MBER_ID = A.REG_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
